channel.title: [CRACKED] Runescape Website Download (OFFICIAL RELEASE)
channel.description:
Let me start by saying this, by downloading this runescape website and using it for your server, you understand that most of the stuff on there is created by Jagex, and has been heavily modified by me. I downloaded their site and viewed the source code and went to the link manually and copied all of them directly and saved them to my files, then i edited some of the files to fix links and make them re-direct and work accordingly, I removed some things for the BETA version and plan to add them later, this project has taken about 2 days to make a replica of the runescape website, later on i will be adding and changing some more things, read the correct tutorial section to find out what i'm going to be changing in the future. Table of Contents: I. Screenshots II. Change Log III. Changing Certain Things IV. Upcoming Changes V. Download Links I. Screenshots Here are some various screenshots of the current website as is, i'll change screenshots as i update the website some more and come out with some new releases. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/206cw9x.png[/img] II. Change Log These are the various things that i have changed with the website, i kept a log when i was doing so, thought i would copy and paste it here to see whats all different. [code] - Removed Logo from Homepage - Removed Banner from Homepage - Removed Login and Register form - Changed the 'Play Now' Button to re-direct to webclient page - Changed data and lists below the graphical part - Removed the promo image - Change the background to create a solid black background - Removed the Runescape text above and the sword - Changed player count to say, "Player Count Here" - Changed Play Now button at top of page to re-direct to the website - Removed Sign in With Facebook - Removed the option to scroll through screenshots - Removed the option to scroll through media - Fixed and added screenshot pop-up window - Change Screenshots images to say 1s.jpg,2s.jpg and so on. - Limited Screenshots section to three images - Disabled most links on the homepage - Changed and updated the footer, added Copyright Jagex - Added, "Heavily edited by EclipseRuins" at the footer - Revised drop down menu's to make run smoother - Optimized page in clean mode for faster loading time and smoother running - Slightly adjusted colors accordingly [/code] III. Changing Certain Things This section will show you how to change certain things on the website, i'm going to have this section have its own person table of contents just to tidy things up and make it all work better. Changing Certain Things: Table of Contents III-1. Screenshots Images III-2. Logo that reads, "your server" III-3. Adding your own webclient III-4. Adding link to your forums III-5. Changing other links in drop-downs III-1. Screenshots Images You'll probably want to change the images for the screenshots on the front of the page to make them fit accordingly, and these can even be images of your server, whatever you'd like really. You can go to, 'Runescape > www.runescape.com > img > main > splash > screenshots' to change the image files and what not. 1.jpg is going to be the first image when its expanded, 1s.jpg is going to be the first image when it is not expanded and it will be as you see it on the home page, this is called the thumbnail. so when you click 1s.jpg it will expand 1.jpg and show the full image, edit these images as you want, for creating thumbnails you can go to http://www.tinypic.com and upload your image and select thumbnail and then select certain dimensions that will fit your needs and correct sizes. III-2. Logo that reads, "your server" This logo is in the top left corner of the website on the home page, you can easily access it and edit it to whatever you would like by going to 'Runescape > www.runescape.com > img > main > splash > Serverlogo.png' this image can be changed to whatever, but i recommend that you do not mess with the dimensions too much. III-3. Adding Your Own Webclient This part isn't too hard, all you need to do is go to the main directory which is located at, 'Runescape > www.runescape.com' and then you need to edit the, 'game.html' file, when you open it, find these two lines: [code]

You can add your webclient by going into game.html and replacing this line!

[/code] Change and delete the 2nd one from the to the and replace it with your own webclient code and whatever else you would like to add to the webclient page. I would recommend a link back to the main website and a link to the forums on the webclient page. III-4. Adding link to your Forums Once again, this isn't the hardest task of making this website fit your custom needs, you can start by going into the main page that is located in 'Runescape > www.runescape.com' in there you should see a file called, 'index.html' just edit that with Notepad or Notepad++ or whatever test editor you would like and find the line that says this: [code]
  • Forums
    • [/code] Replace the '#' with the link to your forums and it will work for you with no troubles. III-5. Changing other links in drop-downs You can change more links on the website by going into the main directory file that's located once again in 'Runescape > www.runescape.com' and when you're in there once again find 'index.html' and scroll down where you will see a section that looks like this below: [code]
    • Videos
    • Screenshots
    • Wallpaper
    • Concept Art
    • Forums
    • Clans
    • Hiscores
    • Grand Exchange
    • Adventurer's Log
    • Loyalty Programme
    • Refer a Friend
    [/code] I'm sure you're hopefully smart enough to match those up with the ones on the website, you can easily change the text by deleting whats in the file and replacing it with whatever you want. You can replace the '#' with a link of whatever you'd like to. IV. Upcoming Changes I've worked on this website so far for about two days and somewhere around 10-13 hours of work in total, i hope to change more things and i'll include what i plan to change below, [code] - Add a tutorial on how to set-up log-in with facebook for your website - Add custom PHP and MySQL forums - Add media pages and finish revising them - Add a working log-in and register script at the top - Implement more motion going objects and aspects to the website - Add the option for more screenshots and the ability to scroll through them - Create new, custom background with nice effects and colors - Implement a player count that's working with the server and pulls information from the server - Create a new highscores theme that will match the website nicely - Add a donation page with the "Upgrade Membership" button working [/code] V. Download Links [i][b]By downloading the files below you agree and understand that this is the work of mainly Jagex and has been edited heavily by me, you can use freely at your own risk, i'm not held responsible for anything that may happen, thanks.[/b][/i] [b]Mediafire Download Link(s)[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2d1zvvgty9j8dbk]Download[/url][b] (35mb) (+)[/b] Let me know what you think of this release and whether or not i should continue to provide more website releases, and continue and progress with this project.
